__e: Anyone still out there ready to perform their duties?
I always tell people to hope for the best and prepare for the worst.
I said the rest of you men get ready for battle.
And below that, "You talk of times of peace for all, "and then prepare for war."
Those with spare time, steel youtselves for our final battle.
The rest of you will work cleanup on whoever makes it through that line of fire.
So leave your kiddies at home and get ready for a wild night, because we, too, will bring someone back from the dead.
I always tell people to hope for the best and prepare for the worst.
